original_text: Is there no balm in Gilead; is there no physician there? why then is not the health of the daughter of my people recovered?
korean_text: 길르앗에는 유향이 있지 아니한가 그 곳에는 의사가 있지 아니한가 딸 내 백성이 치료를 받지 못함은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: Is there no balm in Gilead
why then is not the health
of the daughter of my people recovered
